paper_title.ja: Dipole Excitation of α Cluster in <sup>6</sup>Li and <sup>7</sup>Li
Possible Contribution of a Highly Excited Collective State to Proton-Nucleus Multistep Interactions at 300 MeV

paper_title.en: Isobaric analog states observed in the 58Ni(p,d)57Ni reaction with 65 MeV polarized protons

description.en: Isobaric analog states populated in the (p,d) reaction on 58Ni are studied using 65 MeV high resolution protons. Weakly excited analogs assigned previously as confused spin states are found with proper spins and strengths in the background of a number of normal states. Deviation of the excitation energies of analogs from those calculated with the Coulomb displacement energy is found reasonably to be a function of the excitation energy. Possible anti-analogs of the 1f7/2, 2s1/2, and 1d3/2 hole states are observed.

paper_title.en: Dipole Excitation of α Cluster in <sup>6</sup>Li and <sup>7</sup>Li
Possible Contribution of a Highly Excited Collective State to Proton-Nucleus Multistep Interactions at 300 MeV
Isobaric analog states observed in the 58Ni(p,d)57Ni reaction with 65 MeV polarized protons

description.en: Isobaric analog states populated in the (p,d) reaction on 58Ni are studied using 65 MeV high resolution protons. Weakly excited analogs assigned previously as confused spin states are found with proper spins and strengths in the background of a number of normal states. Deviation of the excitation energies of analogs from those calculated with the Coulomb displacement energy is found reasonably to be a function of the excitation energy. Possible anti-analogs of the 1f7/2, 2s1/2, and 1d3/2 hole states are observed.

paper_title.en: Soft dipole resonance in the neutron-skin nucleus 6He

description.en: A dipole strength at excitation energies lower than the giant dipole resonance (GDR) or soft DR (SDR) in 6He was studied via the 6Li(7Li, 7Be) reaction at an incident energy of 65A MeV. The obtained values of the cross section of both GDR and SDR were compared.

paper_title.en: Soft dipole resonance in the neutron-skin nucleus 6He

description.en: A dipole strength at excitation energies lower than the giant dipole resonance (GDR) or soft DR (SDR) in 6He was studied via the 6Li(7Li, 7Be) reaction at an incident energy of 65A MeV. The obtained values of the cross section of both GDR and SDR were compared.
